name: Treasure T-Pose Dress-up
description:
Quick experiment to see how easily I can copy my previous code for a new image. Not a whole lot of assets to play with here but hey, maybe I'll add on it in the future. This drawing and its assets were originally only made for future reference when drawing this character and I like being able to just hit this page rather than open up the psd file to toggle layers.

I know barely any code and all credit should go to GameLab for their extremely helpful blueprint! I just wanted to play around with the art I've made.

Blueprint: https://github.com/gamelab/Zoe-Dress-up-Blueprint

Originally https://github.com/gamelab/Dressup-Blueprint
